original: Kusalo ajjhatto dhammo naajjhattassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ajjhattaḥ dhammaḥ na ajjhattassa na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā nava, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
analyzed: saṅkhitta ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā nava upanissaye aṭṭhārasa purejāte

original: cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: cha āhāre tīṇi atthiyā avigate cha

original: Kusalo bahiddhā dhammo nabahiddhā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: kusalaḥ bahiddhā dhammaḥ na bahiddhā na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
analyzed: saṅkhitta ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā pannarasa upanissaye aṭṭhārasa purejāte

original: cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: cha āhāre tīṇi atthiyā avigate cha

original: Kusalaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe

original: Kusalaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe
